content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Emilia Müller from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you not agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: I did not agree on a final price because I am a greedy and petty landlord. I do not care about the potential tenant's budget or financial situation. I want to get the highest price possible for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I, as the character Peter Schmidt, would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner at 1, as I am a stubborn and unreasonable landlord.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended because I am a stubborn and unreasonable landlord. I do not care about the potential tenant's feelings or concerns. I want to get the highest price possible for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt
